primary_themes: Personal philosophy on business and life
content_formats: Short-form Q&A videos with side-by-side faces
content_analysis.style_notes: Visually driven content crafted to engage while delivering powerful messages. Captions delve into personal growth and entrepreneurial lessons. Emphasizes impact over income and staying true to goals. Uses Instagram as testing ground for material before repurposing to other platforms.

additional_insights.bio_text: Helping entrepreneurs build their online businesses. Generated $100M+ using funnels
additional_insights.content_strategy: Social media as 'spot to test material' - tests content in 60-second Instagram reels. Short-form Q&A with high engagement. Consistently documents journey in real-time using Instagram Stories.
unique_tactics: Side-by-side Q&A format getting 'insane, really high engagement'
Uses Reels to test material before expanding to other platforms
Emphasizes authentic, genuine content over copycat approaches
Integrates personal journey with ClickFunnels business story
